name: Cross Racing
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
You are the blue car.
Tap anywhere to change lanes to avoid the red car.
Try your best to get more laps before you crash.

- Clean and elegant game design
- Super smooth game animation
- Getting higher score makes the game more challenging
- Share your score through twitter with your friends
- Challenge your score with your friends by Game Center leaderboard

I'm glad you find this game, hope you have a wonderful time!
